patthana15.67:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.67:0.3_0: should hand over to the deep and the following.
patthana15.67:1.1_0: Expert in this way, there is no cause or condition for the unskillful.
patthana15.67:1.1_1: I will not give rise to skillful qualities.
patthana15.67:1.1_2: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
patthana15.67:2.1_0: I will not give rise to the unskillful.
patthana15.67:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
patthana15.67:2.1_3: (These two discourses should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
